Plot: In Battlefield 4, players once again step into the role of the U.S. Marines. They will experience nail biting single player missions and competitive multiplayer action ranging from areas across the world.
Title: Battlefield 4
Writer: Jesse Stern, Mikael Säker, Adrian Vershinin
Actors: Pasha D. Lychnikoff, Artur Abdyrazakov, Adyl Abitov, Andrew Byron
